title: Pharm Logistic
subtitle: International Pharmaceutical Ordering Platform
description: Pharm Logistic is an online platform that connects customers in Uzbekistan with certified pharmaceutical products from international suppliers. The website provides a clear product catalog, transparent ordering process, and ensures delivery of authentic medicines directly to the country.
features: User-friendly product catalog with detailed descriptions
SEO-optimized for local and regional reach

title: ChowGo
subtitle: Automated Fast Food Ordering & Delivery App
description: ChowGo is a fast and intuitive web app that allows users to place food orders from nearby restaurants with minimal input. It integrates geolocation, payment gateways, and live delivery tracking to optimize the ordering process.
features: Instant ordering with pre-configured user preferences
Live order tracking with delivery ETA

title: DevFolio
subtitle: Personal Portfolio & Blog Platform
description: DevFolio is a clean and performant personal site template for developers and freelancers. It includes a blog system, project showcase, dark/light theme toggle, and multi-language support.
features: Dynamic blog system powered by MDX

title: TaskForge
subtitle: Team Collaboration & Task Management Tool
description: TaskForge is a modern Kanban-based task management system for small teams. It features drag-and-drop functionality, real-time updates with websockets, and role-based permissions.
features: Drag-and-drop task board with multiple views
User authentication with RBAC (Role-Based Access Control)
